trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to modify the set of member descriptors for a component in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供介面，在設計模式中修改元件的成員描述項集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> interface provides an interface that allows modification of the properties, events, and class-level attributes of a component at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>介面提供可讓修改設計階段屬性、 事件和元件的類別層級屬性的介面。

trans-unit.source: This modification occurs through the set of descriptors that a component provides through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這項修改會透過元件透過所提供的描述元組<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: The type descriptor will query a component's site for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> service and, if it exists, the type descriptor will pass all metadata it has collected to this service.
trans-unit.target: 類型描述元將查詢元件的站台<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>服務和型別描述項如果存在的話，會傳遞到此服務所收集的所有中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The service can then modify the metadata by adding, removing, and altering existing characteristics of the component.
trans-unit.target: 服務可以透過新增、 移除和變更現有的元件特性修改中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, the properties of a component can be modified through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，修改元件的屬性，透過呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The filter service obtains a dictionary that contains property names and their property descriptors of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 篩選服務所取得字典，其中包含屬性名稱和型別其屬性描述元<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: The modifications are implemented using the following logic.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列邏輯來實作所做的修改。

trans-unit.source: Modification
trans-unit.target: 修改

trans-unit.source: Implementation
trans-unit.target: 實作

trans-unit.source: Removal
trans-unit.target: 移除

trans-unit.source: Delete the corresponding entry in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 刪除在字典中的對應項目。

trans-unit.source: Addition
trans-unit.target: 加入

trans-unit.source: Add the appropriate entry to the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 將適當的項目加入至字典。

trans-unit.source: Alteration
trans-unit.target: 改變

trans-unit.source: Call existing property descriptor methods, replace the associated property descriptor entry, or replace the entire property key/value pair in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫現有的屬性描述元方法、 取代關聯的屬性描述元的項目，或取代在字典中的整個屬性索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties%2A> determines if this set of properties is fixed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties%2A>決定是否要修正這一組屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> for this component can cache the results.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`、<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>針對此元件可以快取結果。

trans-unit.source: This cache is maintained until either the component is garbage collected or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%2A> method of the type descriptor is called.
trans-unit.target: 此快取會維護，直到其中一個元件是記憶體回收或<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%2A>呼叫方法的類型描述元。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a designer that uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> to filter the attributes collection of any new or existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> to add a designer attribute for a new designer before loading or reloading the designer for the button.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設計工具<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>來篩選屬性集合的任何新的或現有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>設計工具屬性加入新的設計工具才能載入或重新載入設計工具的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: To use the example, add the code to a Windows Forms project and load the components from the class library into the Toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的範例，Windows Form 專案中加入程式碼並載入元件類別庫的 [工具箱]。

trans-unit.source: Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱[逐步解說： 自動填入工具箱 「 自訂 」 元件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Add some buttons to your form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入一些按鈕到表單。

trans-unit.source: Add a `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` to your form, and it will appear in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 新增`ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`加入至表單中，就會出現在元件匣中。

trans-unit.source: The `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` will add a `ButtonDesignerFilterService`, which implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>, as a design mode service provider.
trans-unit.target: `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`將`ButtonDesignerFilterService`，它會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>，做為設計模式服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Existing or new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> objects on the form will begin color cycling after the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` replaces the designer for each existing and new button with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`.
trans-unit.target: 現有或新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>表單上的物件就會開始後循環的色彩`ButtonDesignerFilterService`會取代每個現有和新按鈕與設計工具`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`。

trans-unit.source: The buttons will color cycle when you move the mouse pointer over them, and alternately continue cycling or reset the background and foreground colors on `MouseLeave` events.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕會循環，當您移動滑鼠指標停留，或者繼續循環或是重設背景和前景色彩的色彩`MouseLeave`事件。

trans-unit.source: New <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> objects will be given the `ColorCycleButtonDesigner` through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A> method of the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` that has been loaded, until the `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` is disposed and replaces the original <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>物件會獲得`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A>方法`ButtonDesignerFilterService`，已載入，直到`ButtonDesignerFilterComponent`處置時，會取代原始<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>。

trans-unit.source: The `ColorCycleButton` class in this example is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> associated with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`.
trans-unit.target: `ColorCycleButton`類別，在此範例中是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>聯`ColorCycleButtonDesigner`。

trans-unit.source: To filter the member descriptors exposed by a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />, implement this interface on a component and override the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />, <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterEvents(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />, or <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> methods of this class to filter attributes, events, or properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要篩選所公開的成員描述項<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />、 在元件上實作這個介面，並覆寫<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />， <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterEvents(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />，或<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />分別篩選屬性、 事件或屬性，這個類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The component to filter the attributes of.
trans-unit.target: 要篩選其屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改的屬性字典。

trans-unit.source: Filters the attributes that a component exposes through a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 篩選元件透過 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> 所公開的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; <see langword="false" /> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: 如果要對篩選的屬性集進行快取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user requests a set of attributes for a component.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者要求一組元件的屬性，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The attributes are added to the dictionary with the attribute's <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A> as the keys and the actual attribute as the value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會加入到具有該屬性的字典<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A>列為索引鍵，做為值的實際屬性。

trans-unit.source: Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter existing attribute entries in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此服務的實作器可以新增、 移除或變更在字典中的現有屬性項目。

trans-unit.source: Return <see langword="false" /> only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see langword="false" />只有必要時，因為重複的型別描述項的篩選器服務的查詢可能會降低效能。

trans-unit.source: The component to filter events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其篩選事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of events that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改的事件字典。

trans-unit.source: Filters the events that a component exposes through a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 篩選元件透過 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> 所公開的事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the set of filtered events is to be cached; <see langword="false" /> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: 如果要對篩選的事件集進行快取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user requests a set of events for a component.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者要求一組元件的事件，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The events are added to the dictionary with the event names as the keys and the corresponding <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> objects as the values.
trans-unit.target: 事件做為索引鍵和對應新增到事件名稱與字典<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>做為值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter event entries in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此服務的實作器可以新增、 移除或變更在字典中的事件項目。

trans-unit.source: Return <see langword="false" /> only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see langword="false" />只有必要時，因為重複的型別描述項的篩選器服務的查詢可能會降低效能。

trans-unit.source: The component to filter properties for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其篩選屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of properties that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改的屬性字典。

trans-unit.source: Filters the properties that a component exposes through a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 篩選元件透過 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> 所公開的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the set of filtered properties is to be cached; <see langword="false" /> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: 如果要對篩選的屬性集進行快取，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user requests a set of properties for a component.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者要求一組元件的屬性，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The properties are added to the dictionary with the property names as the keys and the corresponding <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> objects as the values.
trans-unit.target: 屬性加入至字典的屬性名稱做為索引鍵和對應<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>做為值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter property entries in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此服務的實作器可以新增、 移除或變更屬性字典中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Return <see langword="false" /> only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see langword="false" />只有必要時，因為重複的型別描述項的篩選器服務的查詢可能會降低效能。
